sentences.english: Abdominal pain is suggestive of pelvic inflammatory disease and suprapubic pain is suggestive of cystitis.

sentences.english: At 12 weeks the fundus becomes palpable at the symphysis pubis.

sentences.english: Imagine that the sacrum is sinking deeper into the back of your pelvis and bring the tailbone closer to the pubis.

sentences.english: Press your tailbone toward your pubis and turn the upper thighs inward slightly.

sentences.english: Lengthen your tailbone away from the back of your pelvis and press it lightly toward the pubis.

sentences.english: A caudal ventral midline coeliotomy from umbilicus to pubis should be performed.

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of reconstruction plate internal fixation for pubic symphysis separation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討重建鋼板內固定治療恥骨聯合分離的效果。

sentences.english: Conversely, the pubic symphysis anteriorly is weaker and more easily ruptured.
